channel.title: Comments on: You can stand right there if you want
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: oh E! that sounds so "ouch". i call it the x-factor. i missed the bullet a few times myself. i'm guessing we all have. as for drey, he's just that helpless romantic. poor guy ;)
item.content:encoded: oh E! that sounds so “ouch”. i call it the x-factor. i missed the bullet a few times myself. i’m guessing we all have. as for drey, he’s just that helpless romantic. poor guy ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: E!
item.dc:creator: E!
item.description:
Me? I always feel cold when I see or hear about my exes and their new lives. The man I lost my virginity to sent me a picture of his wife and 13 year old son...13 years and a few months after we'd broken up (you do the math!) and I just felt the swish of a bullet barely missing me. There but for the grace of goddess...
Something, someday will break and ruin me, but it won't be THAT one.
item.content:encoded:
Me? I always feel cold when I see or hear about my exes and their new lives. The man I lost my virginity to sent me a picture of his wife and 13 year old son…13 years and a few months after we’d broken up (you do the math!) and I just felt the swish of a bullet barely missing me. There but for the grace of goddess…

Something, someday will break and ruin me, but it won’t be THAT one.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: sorry. but seriously, all your "keys" and "triggers" and your endless quest of the vulnerable heart all adds up to that magical mix you call drey. (sorry i still call you andre). but it must all lead somewhere amazing. it always seems to, in my opinion.
item.content:encoded: sorry. but seriously, all your “keys” and “triggers” and your endless quest of the vulnerable heart all adds up to that magical mix you call drey. (sorry i still call you andre). but it must all lead somewhere amazing. it always seems to, in my opinion.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: it'll be OK ;) is the child cuban? does it have a big nose?
